name: Simple Wii Series Vol. 1: The Minna de Kart Race
overview: Simple Wii Series Vol. 1: The Minna de Kart Race (SIMPLE Wiiシリーズ Vol.1 THE みんなでカート・レース) is the first of D3's "Simple Series" launched on the Japanese market for the Wii platform. A kart racer similar to the Mario Racing series. This game not only supports split-screen four-player competition, but also supports global competition through Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection.
